title: Restricted Doomsday Syndrome - Novel Updates
author: 全部成为F
description: Restricted Doomsday Syndrome is a novel inspired by Matrix, Blame, Hellsing that narrates the end of the world in 1999. It is a story about Gao Chuan, a 17-year-old high school student, who tries to find a student who disappeared on-campus, and then unexpectedly becomes a chosen tasked with the 'prevention of Doomsday'.>
